linefit.IO

Class ExportIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • linefit.IO.ExportIO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasOptionsToDisplay, HasOptionsToSave

    public class ExportIO
extends java.lang.Object
implements HasOptionsToSave, HasOptionsToDisplay
    This class Handles all of the export functionality of LineFit including JPG, PDF, and LaTex. The PNG export is WYSWYG, basing its dimensions on the current LineFit window but the other exports are done based on the export settings in the options panel.
    Since:
    0.99.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Keith Rice

      • ExportIO

        public ExportIO(GeneralIO parentIO,
                javax.swing.JFrame frameToCenterOn,
                GraphArea graphToExport)
        The constructor for ExportIO that associates this instance with the passed instances
        Parameters:
        parentIO - The GeneralIO instance that this LineFitFileIO belongs to and uses for common IO related functionality
        frameToCenterOn - The JFrame to center dialogs on or null to center them on the screen
        graphToExport - The GraphArea that this ExportIO instance will export

      • readInOption

        public boolean readInOption(java.lang.String lineRead)
        Reads in the options associated with exporting in from the LineFit data file
        Specified by:
        readInOption in interface HasOptionsToSave
        Parameters:
        lineRead - The line to attempt to read a setting from
        Returns:
        True if an export option was found in the passed line and False if the line did not contain an export option

      • inchesToPixels

        private static int inchesToPixels(double inchesToConvert)
        Converts the given length in inches to pixel length - used to determine the size of PDF when we export it
        Parameters:
        inchesToConvert - The number of inches to convert to equivalent amount of pixels
        Returns:
        The number of pixels that are equivalent to the inputed number of inches
